name: Blood Metal (itch)
description:
Run over zombies to replenish the timer.  Destroy cars by shooting them for points

Twisted Metal  X  Carmageddon

( SFX from freesound.org )


Controls:

Accelerator :  W / Z / Up Arrow
Turn :  AD / QD / Left and right Arrow
Reverse :  S / Down Arrow
Emergency brake :  Tap  X / L
Shoot :  Hold  C / K
Restart :  R
